list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: state or assert that something is the case, typically without providing evidence or proof.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he claimed that he came from a wealthy, educated family
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông tuyên bố rằng ông đến từ một gia đình giàu có, giáo dục

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an assertion of the truth of something, typically one that is disputed or in doubt.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was dogged by the claim that he had CIA links
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị bướng bỉnh bởi tuyên bố rằng anh ta có CIA Links

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a demand or request for something considered one's due.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the court had denied their claims to asylum
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tòa án đã từ chối tuyên bố của họ đối với Tị nạn
